Description: Website title displayed in the browser title bar.
Default setting for attribute grouping of KPIs, Charts and Tables.
Visual KPI site administrator contact (also be used for cache server error notifications).
Default link action when clicking site logos.

Controls screen data update interval (in seconds) for Web pages.  Set 0 to turn off page data refresh.  (Note: This should not be faster than your cache cycle as the cache time determines how often data is refreshed on the server).
Controls the default color theme (light or dark) for the site. Users can override this setting on each site if allowed.

Attribute: Allow Users to Change Color Theme
Description: Determines whether or not site users can select between Dark and Light themes.
Controls the default display time (client time or server time) for all rendered timestamps. Site users can override this setting on each site if allowed.

Attribute: Allow Users to Change Client Display Time
Description: Determines whether or not site users will be able to select between client and server times for all rendered timestamps.

Controls the interval (in minutes) for a full page refresh. This helps clear memory leaks--unfortunately common and not entirely unavoidable (yet) in Web applications. (Note: User actions will reset the interval. 0 = turn off this refresh).
Cache server error notification delivery mechanism.
Controls how often (in minutes) cache server error alerts are sent to the site administrator.
Determines the time (in minutes) that should elapse before displaying a site level cache failure warning (0 = always hide this warning).
Determines the time (in days) a KPI status history should be stored (Forever = keep all history). Note: A large number of Forever settings causes the size of the Visual KPI database to grow.
Determines time (in minutes) that should elapse before displaying a site level alert failure warning (0 = always hide this warning).
Determines time (in days) a KPI status history is stored.
Determines the default tab for each group.  'System' automatically displays the first non-empty tab in this series (Groups, KPIs, Charts, Tables).
Determines the default view for Groups on the home page.
Determines the default view for KPIs.
Determines the default view for Charts.
Determines the default view for Tables.
Default name used to display the info column in Groups, KPIs, Charts and Tables.

Attribute: Default KPI Actual Column Display Name
Description: Default name used to display the actual column in KPIs.

Attribute: Default KPI Target Column Display Name
Description: Default name used to display the target column in KPIs.
Default numeric format string for KPIs and Info. Leave blank for system defaults.

Attribute: Use KPI Name as Top Text
Description: Determines whether or not the KPI name is used by default as the KPI Map top text if no other top text has been entered.

Attribute: Use KPI Actual as Bottom Text
Description: Determines whether or not the KPI actual value is used by default as the KPI Map bottom text if no other bottom text has been entered.

Attribute: Use KPI Description as Additional Text
Description: Determines whether or not the KPI description is used by default as the KPI Map additional text if no other additional text has been entered.
Maximum length of lookup text displayed on chart cursors (0 = No lookup text displayed).
Maximum number of Groups displayed. Additional Groups can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (100 max).
Maximum number of KPIs, Charts and Tables initially displayed. Additional KPIs, Charts and Tables can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (100 max).
Maximum number of KPIs initially displayed as a KPI Map. Additional KPIs can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (500 max).
Maximum number of Groups initially displayed as a Group Map. Additional Groups can be shown by clicking 'Show More' (200 max).
Maximum number of bars displayed for dynamic Pareto Charts given a large enough display (5 min and 50 max).
Maximum number of recently used Profiles shown in profile list (3 min and 10 max).

Category: Geo Map and Near Me Settings
Description: Default unit of measure for Near Me distance.

Category: Geo Map and Near Me Settings
Attribute: Default Group Geo Map Label Format
Description: Default format of Group Geo Map labels.

Category: Geo Map and Near Me Settings
Attribute: Default KPI Geo Map Label Format
Description: Default format of KPI Geo Map labels.

Category: Geo Map and Near Me Settings
Attribute: Show Geo Map Info Window On Large Screens
Description: Controls whether or not to display the pop-up Geo Map info panels on screens with a horizontal resolution of 768 pixels or more.

Category: Geo Map and Near Me Settings
Attribute: Show Geo Map Info Window On Small Screens
Description: Controls whether or not to display the pop-up Geo Map info panel on screens with a horizontal resolution of 768 pixels or less.
Controls whether or not Trends will dynamically update.
Controls how many lockable cursors (10 max) are allowed on Charts displayed on screens with a horizontal resolution of 768 pixels or more.
Controls how many lockable cursors (10 max) are allowed on Charts displayed on screens with a horizontal resolution of 768 pixels or less.
Controls whether or calculations (equations) are displayed in Chart cursors.
Controls whether or not to initially display limits on KPI Trends (can toggle ON/OFF).
Controls whether or not to initially display target on KPI Trends (can toggle ON/OFF).

Attribute: Show Status Background on KPI Trends
Description: Controls whether or not to initially display status bars on the background of KPI Trends (can toggle ON/OFF--requires KPI Status History Storage Duration > 0).
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Trends.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Pareto Charts.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Bar Charts.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on XY Plots.
Length of time that timestamp-based Charts and Tables can be scrolled.
Unit of time that timestamp-based Charts and Tables can be scrolled.
Controls whether or not the page header will scroll as the page is scrolled.
Controls whether or not page legends are displayed.
Controls whether or not the site information page is available.
Controls whether or not Group detail pages are available.
Controls whether or not KPI detail pages are available.
Controls whether or not Chart detail pages are available.
Controls whether or not Table detail pages are available.
Controls whether or not links on Site Rollups are available.
Controls whether or not links on Groups are available.
Controls whether or not links on KPIs are available.
Controls whether or not links on Charts are available.
Controls whether or not links on Tables are available.
Controls whether or not KPI sparklines show Target pen.
Controls whether or not Groups with no data are displayed (Note: Empty Groups will always be hidden if Object Level Security is enabled).
Controls whether or not Group KPI Roll-Up bars are displayed.
Controls whether or not an object's name displays a tooltip on mouse-over.

Attribute: Show Unused Fields in Detail Pages
Description: Detail pages will show 'N/A' for all empty or unused fields if this setting is TRUE.

Attribute: Display Alert History on KPI Detail Page
Description: Controls whether or not alert history appears on KPI detail pages.
Controls whether or not the KPI override indicator (*) is shown on KPIs with a status override.
Controls time (in minutes) the system considers a KPI status change to be 'recent'.
Controls time (in seconds) the KPI will 'flash' after screen load for a recently changed KPI. (Off = Never, Max = Until no longer 'recent', or any numeric value).

Attribute: Show Group Description in Rollup Page
Description: Controls whether or not Group descriptions appear in column next to Rollups.
Controls whether or not child objects (KPIs, Charts and Tables) are shown on the same page as Groups in List View.

Attribute: Default Group Map KPI Cell Count
Description: Number of KPI cells displayed on each Group Map (1 minimum and 20 max).

Controls Group Map header cell behavior. Sets the header color and icon based on status: 'Recently Changed' = color of most recently changed KPI and icon to overall KPI status. 'Overall' = color of most severe KPI status and icon to most recently changed status. 'Custom Colors' = color to either the custom recently changed or not recently changed colors and no icons.
Group Map header color if one or more KPIs in the Group has recently changed (applies only if Custom Colors is selected for Header Priority).
Group Map header color if no KPIs in the Group have recently changed (applies only if Custom Colors is selected for Header Priority).

Controls whether or not the Group Map will display on a single screen (no scrolling). This can cause large Group Maps to render with very small cells that are difficult to read. If the cell size gets too small text will be removed.
Controls whether or not the Group Map is expanded or collapsed (header only) by default.
Controls how the system calculates severity of status for use in header colors and icons. (Note: Not In Service always overrides other statuses).

Attribute: Simplify KPI Blocks with Missing Data
Description: Simplify KPI block widget if a valid sparkline and Bullet Chart cannot be rendered. (TRUE = remove sparkline, Bullet Chart, actions, statistics and contact).
Display a sparkline (trend) on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).

Attribute: Show Bullet Chart on KPI Blocks
Description: Display a Bullet Chart on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).

Attribute: Show Status History Chart on KPI Blocks
Description: Display a Status History Chart on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).
Display statistics on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).
Display actions on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).
Display KPI contact on KPI Blocks (Note: Can override setting on each block).

Category: Time Range and Event Range Settings
Description: Controls whether or not the predefined list of time ranges displays on range pickers (Note: The predefined list of ranges must also be configured).

Category: Time Range and Event Range Settings
Description: Controls whether or not query based event ranges displays on range pickers (Note: Event Range connectstring and query must also be defined).

Category: Time Range and Event Range Settings
Description: Controls which range selection section is expanded by default (Note: This will only apply if both event and time ranges have been configured and set to SHOW).
Controls how non numeric values in calculations are handled.
Substitution value for string results in numeric calculations. This is useful when dealing with exception data (e.g. BadValue) returned from data sources used in a calculation.

Used to determine KPI status change calculation behavior. 'Exceeds Only' = Actual is less than < a low limit or greater than > a high limit. 'Meets or Exceeds' (default) = Actual is less than < or equal to = a low limit or greater than > or equal to = a high limit.
Determines the default view for Watchlist KPIs.
Default setting for attribute grouping of Watchlist KPIs.
Windows Security Group that grants user(s) access to all objects. (Used when Object Level Security is enabled).
Windows Security Group that grants user(s) admin rights to objects via the website. (Used for Trend Comments and Profile management).
Controls whether or not outbound links (e.g. URLs, Fonts, Google APIs) are enabled (Note: Must enable to use Geo Maps).
